name: Claudia Brown
offering: Business Coaching, Business Consulting, Life Navigation
what_you_do: Claudia Esser Brown is a Business Mastery Coach and Holistic Transformational Life Coach who helps business owners scale their businesses from six to seven figures within a year without increasing their workload or ad budgets.
who_you_serve: She serves six-figure-plus business owners and seven- to eight-figure entrepreneurs seeking better sales and revenue systems for predictability and profitability.
bio: Featured in Fox Business, Forbes, Inc., Success, Entrepreneur, and other media channels; 18+ years of experience in business coaching.
business_focus: Claudia Esser Brown is a Business Mastery Coach and Holistic Transformational Life Coach who helps business owners scale their businesses from six to seven figures within a year without increasing their workload or ad budgets. (business coaching)
